trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Biedt gegevens voor de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> gebeurtenis van de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> besturingselement.

trans-unit.source: The CustomizeLegendEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: De klasse CustomizeLegendEventArgs wordt gebruikt in de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>gebeurtenis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: There are only two properties in this class.
trans-unit.target: Er zijn slechts twee eigenschappen in deze klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>eigenschap kunt u de te verwijderen of wijzigen van de standaard- en aangepaste legenda-items en aangepaste legenda-items toevoegen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to change the order of legend items.
trans-unit.target: Deze eigenschap kan ook worden gebruikt om de volgorde van legenda-items te wijzigen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> property is used to identify the legend that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>eigenschap wordt gebruikt voor het identificeren van de legenda die deze gebeurtenis wordt gegenereerd.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> klasse met de opgegeven <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> and legend name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> klasse met de opgegeven <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref> en de naam van de legenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The legend name.
trans-unit.target: De naam van de legenda.

trans-unit.source: Used to remove, modify or change the order of both custom and default legend items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gebruikt om te verwijderen, wijzigen of de volgorde van beide aangepaste wijzigen en standaard legenda-items in de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> gebeurtenis.

trans-unit.source: Can also be used to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Kan ook worden gebruikt voor aangepaste legenda-items toevoegen.

trans-unit.source: The LegendItems property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: De eigenschap LegendItems kunt u te verwijderen of wijzigen van de standaard- en aangepaste legenda-items in de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>gebeurtenis, en het toevoegen van aangepaste legenda-items.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: The order of legend items can also be changed.
trans-unit.target: De volgorde van legenda-items kan ook worden gewijzigd.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> and [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) properties can be used to determine the data element that is associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>en [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) eigenschappen kunnen worden gebruikt om te bepalen van het gegevenselement die is gekoppeld aan een standaard legenda-item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties will return zero-length strings for custom legend items, because custom items are not associated with chart data.
trans-unit.target: Deze eigenschappen retourneert tekenreeksen met lengte nul voor aangepaste legenda-items, omdat aangepaste items niet gekoppeld aan de grafiekgegevens zijn.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> the event was raised for, which enables you to customize an individual [Legend](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Deze eigenschap kunt u bepalen welke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>de gebeurtenis is voorgevallen, waardoor u een afzonderlijk aanpassen [legenda](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object, which can be used to determine which legend was the sender of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt de naam van de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> -object, dat kan worden gebruikt om te bepalen welke legenda is de afzender van het <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> gebeurtenis.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> -waarde de naam van de bijbehorende vertegenwoordigt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> object.
